condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased action by business, business stakeholders and key influencers on the direct and indirect impact of business policies and operations on children

description.narrative: There has been meaningful engagement with businesses, key business influencers and other relevant stakeholders in the private sector, to enhance their direct and indirect activation around child rights in business principles and their sustainability. The progress is satisfactory and we have met most targets for the year. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/01/2020
